definition: system/to control/to regulate/variant of 製|制[zhi4]
exterior surface/family relationship via females/to show (one's opinion)/a model/a table (listing information)/a form/a meter (measuring sth)

sentences.english: Avoid hard-coding blank spaces or tabs at the end of a line of sample code.
sentences.chinese: 要避免在示例代码行的结尾用硬编码空格或制表符。

sentences.english: Q. What effect do tabs, spaces, and new lines have on the program?
sentences.chinese: 制表位，空格和换行符对程序有什么影响？

sentences.english: Avoid using tabs at the beginning of a line of sample code.
sentences.chinese: 避免在示例代码行的开始使用制表符。

sentences.english: Horizontal-tab delay type 1 is dependent on the current column position.
sentences.chinese: 水平制表符延迟类型1依赖于当前列的位置。

sentences.english: This will create a tab-separated file, each row on its own line.
sentences.chinese: 这将创建一个制表符分隔的文件，各方自行排线。

sentences.english: Switzerland is considered to be the watch-making capital of the world.
sentences.chinese: 瑞士被认为是全球制表业的首都。

sentences.english: Avoid hardcoding blank spaces or tabs at the end of a line of sample code as these are included in the 90 characters per line.
sentences.chinese: 避免在代码行尾处使用全角空格或者制表符。

sentences.english: Explains how to set default measures for tabs and indents.
sentences.chinese: 说明如何设置制表符和缩进的默认度量。

sentences.english: There is a green bar on the top of the screen with tabs.
sentences.chinese: 有一个绿色大律师公会对画面上方用制表符。

sentences.english: He encouraged his apprentices to set themselves up in business, and a culture of watchmaking developed.
sentences.chinese: 他鼓励他的学徒自立门户，从而发展出制表文化。

sentences.english: Geneva, a city of watchmaking, jewellery, and chic fashion.
sentences.chinese: 日内瓦，是一个制表业，珠宝业和别致时尚之都。

sentences.english: The default field delimiter is the tab character.
sentences.chinese: 默认的字段分隔符是制表符。

sentences.english: Thus the watch-making was started in Switzerland.
sentences.chinese: 自此，制表业开始在瑞士兴起。

sentences.english: Sometimes you may want to swap tabs for spaces or vice versa.
sentences.chinese: 有时候，您可能希望将制表符替换为空格，或者相反。
代码中不应该有制表符。

sentences.english: Your watch has been adjusted and electronically timed by skilled watch workers.
sentences.chinese: 你的表已经由熟练的制表工校正并已经电子定时。

definition: Van Cleef & Arpels (French luxury jewelry company)

pinyin: A1 er3 fa3 · Luo2 mi4 ou1

definition: Leonardo da Vinci (1452-1519), Italian Renaissance painter (Tw)
